direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods manipulate the optionMap and handle Option objects.
Both methods interact with the 'selected' field, one setting it and the other retrieving it.
Both methods deal with the state of the 'selected' field, one setting it and the other checking its state.
Both methods modify the state of the OptionGroup object, one setting the selected option and the other setting the required flag.

enhanced_by.reason: Adding options to the group is a prerequisite for selecting an option.
Checking if an option is already selected is relevant before setting a new selection.
Retrieving the selected option is necessary to verify the correctness of the setSelected method.
